title: Calling
verses: Ephesians 2:10 (WEB) — “We are his workmanship… created in Christ Jesus for good works… that we would walk in them.”
Romans 12:6–8 (WEB) — “Having gifts differing… let us use them.”
1 Corinthians 12:7 (WEB) — “To each is given the manifestation of the Spirit for the profit of all.”
Colossians 3:17 (WEB) — “Whatever you do… do all in the name of the Lord Jesus.”
body: Calling is less about a spotlight role and more about a faithful life with Christ. Discern your gifts, burdens, and opportunities. Do the next good you know to do—in Jesus’ name—for the good of others.
prayer: Master and Shepherd, direct my steps. Use my gifts for Your glory and others’ good. Make me faithful in small things and bold in love. Amen.
